remarks: Addition in the free group is given by concatenation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.)
statement:
frgpadd.w $e |- W = ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) $.
frgpadd.g $e |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) $.
frgpadd.r $e |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) $.
frgpadd.n $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
frgpadd $p |- ( ( A e. W /\ B e. W ) -> ( [ A ] .~ .+ [ B ] .~ ) = [ ( A ++ B ) ] .~ ) $.
